a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people using at least basic sanitation facilities, 2000 to 2015
Number of people using at least basic sanitation facilities; that is improved sanitation facilities not shared with other households.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP)
